dict.acceptation: 银行；（条形的）堆；（河的）岸；库存；
堆积；筑（堤）；将（钱）存入银行；
（转弯时）倾斜飞行；（在某银行）开账户，存款；

sent.orig: The bank has only advised us those our Draft No.2 was de clined (rejected, refemploy).
sent.trans: 我们刚收到bank通知，我们的第二号汇票被拒付了。

sent.orig: Bank-To-Turn (BTT) and Skid-To-Turn (STT) control techniques are widely used in current missile control systems.
sent.trans: 现代导弹控制技术一般可分为侧滑转弯(Skid-to-Turn,STT)控制技术和倾斜转弯(Bank-to-Tum,BTT)控制技术。

sent.orig: Bank-to-turn(BTT) technology is a novel control technology with great vitality. It has been deeply investigated abroad.
sent.trans: 倾斜转弯(Bank—to—Turn简称BTT)技术是一门新的控制技术，具有强大的生命力，国外已开始深入的研究。

sent.orig: Advising bank means the bank that advises the credit at the request of the issuing bank.
sent.trans: 通知行指应开证行的要求通知信用证的银行。

sent.orig: The sixth, seventh, eighth largest shareholders of Swiss Bank, the Asian Development Bank and Mitsubishi Bank.
sent.trans: 其第六、第七、第八大股东分别为瑞士银行，亚洲开发银行和三菱银行。
